attributes.action: Condemn the USA police forces for killing innocent black citizens on the street.
attributes.additional_details: Latest case - two black citizens who were asleep in their car when police officers shot and killed them - http://thefreethoughtproject.com/parents-date-night-passed-car-police-showed/
attributes.background: Barely a week goes by without a story emerging of police officers in the USA killing innocent black citizens on the street without punishment. It's time the international community let the USA government know that these kinds of human rights abuses can not be tolerated in modern civilised society.

rejection.details:
It's not clear whether this petition is calling on the international community, or just the UK Government, to take this action. We can only accept petitions that call on the Government to take action.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to urge the US Government to take action on this.
